content: this beanie is feminine and simple to make it has instructions for three sizes and the length is easy to alter it stretches a lot due to the front-post double crochets which create the ridges and while you are working it up it will look smaller than its actual size if you have never done front-post double crochets before they are easy to master and i have included instructions this beanie matches my scarf pattern urban shells 1 the newborn size beanie makes a great baby shower gift it s quick to make doesn t use much yarn and looks super cute **as of 25/8/2014 this pattern is now available in italian thank you fantasiedinephtys http //lefantasiedinephtys altervista org/cappello-conchiglie-urban-shells/** *any item that you make from this pattern is yours to do with what you please including selling so long as you do not claim credit for the design * *if you do make items from this pattern to sell i would like the pattern to be referenced - it stops people thinking you re using it without permission and it s handy for referral purposes - also it s good manners * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/urban-shells
